name: Jump Jump Rabbit
description:
“Jump Jump Rabbit” is a casual game of smooth spring winds and hospitable deserts. Go on an adventure with the little white bunny hero, help him travel far and come home with an abundant collection of his favorite carrots!

The rules are simple: press and hold on the screen to charge, and release to jump. Aim carefully, fly past carrots to collect them, and land at the center of the next block platform to get a special bonus. Meet and beat your friends on the way, and if your hands slipped, you can always spend some carrots to save your character from the falling.

Try your best, and never give up a chance to clench the top place of every week! How much can you and your little bunny score?

“Jump Jump Rabbit” includes very small ads to keep it free. To get better gameplay experience, buy “Remove Ads” and contribute to our further development of the game. For any suggestion or feedback, please contact us at codingpotato@gmail.com. If you like the game, leave a review to help us improve continually. Thank you very much!
